entities
Class NPC

java.lang.Object
  entities.NPC

public class NPC
extends Object

Class NPC - a non playing character. This class is part of the "GO Sunset" application. "Go Sunset" is a very simple, text based adventure game adapted from the "World of Zuul" application. An NPC is a character that the player can interact with and trade items with.

Version:
2014.03.04
Author:
Louis Capitanchik, Joshua Mulcock, Alice Charterton, John Stones

 void act()
          Used to move the NPCs into a valid and connected room exits is a HashMap of availabe exits r is a random variable valid is a boolean variable to show when a valid room has been found exitNum is the placement of the valid room found

Constructor Detail

NPC

public NPC(Game context,
           HashMap<String,String> attributes)
This constructs the NPC class, using information that will be passed when a new NPC object is created. name is the NPC's name. itemHeld is the item that the NPC currently has and will trade with the player for the item which is wanted. itemNeeded is the item that the NPC wants and will trade the the itemHeld for. speech is the the text that will be printed out when the player interacts with NPC. currentRoom is the name of the room the NPC is currently in.

Parameters:
npcName - the name of the NPC.
needed - is the Item that the NPC needs.
held - is the Item that the NPC currently.
npcSpeech - is the speech for the NPC.
npcRoom - is the room that the NPC is currrently in.
Method Detail

act

public void act()
Used to move the NPCs into a valid and connected room exits is a HashMap of availabe exits r is a random variable valid is a boolean variable to show when a valid room has been found exitNum is the placement of the valid room found

swapItems

public Item swapItems(Item itemToSwap)
Swaps the item held by the npc with the given item

Parameters:
itemToSwap - the item that will be given to the NPC
Returns:
the item the NPC was previously holding
